scigenex 1.2.21

ClusterSet

Source: R/ClusterSet_class.R
ClusterSet-class.Rd

This class is a representation of a partitioning algorithm and is intented to store gene clusters.

Value

A ClusterSet object.

Slots

name

character. The original input file name (if applicable).

data

matrix. The matrix containing the filtered/partitionned data.

distances

vector. The observed distance values with the knn.

simulated_distances

vector. The simulated distance values with the knn.

critical_distance

vector. The critical threshold distance to select informative genes.

gene_patterns

vector. Mapping of row/genes to gene_patterns.

size

vector. The size of each cluster.

dot_prodcut

vector. The median dot product of each gene clusters.

top_genes

matrix The highly co-expressed genes of each gene clusters.

center

matrix. The centers of each clusters.

parameters

list. The parameter used.

algorithm

vector. The algorithm used to produce the clusters.

cell_clusters

list The cell clusters.

cell_types

vector. The cell types.

cell_colors

vector. The cell types to color mapping.

cell_order

vector. How cell should be ordered.

cluster_annotations

list. Functional annotation of clusters.

Examples


if (FALSE) {
  m <- matrix(rnorm(80000), nc=20)
   m[1:100,1:10] <- m[1:100,1:10] + 4
   m[101:200,11:20] <- m[101:200,11:20] + 3
   m[201:300,5:15] <- m[201:300,5:15] + -2
   res <- DBFMCL(data=m,
                 distance_method="pearson",
                 av_dot_prod_min = 0,
                 inflation = 1.2,
                 k=25,
                 fdr = 10)
plot_clust(res, ceil = 10, floor = -10)
plot_clust(res, type="tile", ceil = 10, floor = -10)
write_clust(res, filename_out = "ALL.sign.txt")
  is(res)
}
